directions: Heat oil add boiled potatoes, fry for 5 minutes till golden add all the seasoning with yogurt, fry well, cover and cook till thick gravy left, lastly add chopped coriander.
ingredients: Baby potatoes half kg boiled and peeled
Kashmiri red chilies soaked and grinded 6
Roasted and crushed cumin 1 ½ tsp
Roasted and crushed coriander 1 ½ tsp
title: Kashmiri Spicy Potatoes
